COURSE/DEGREE AWARDING 
INSTITUTIONS  
REQUIREMENTS    
UTME SUBJECTS  
  
SPECIAL CONSIDERATION (WAIVER) REMARKS  DIRECT ENTRY  UTME  
  
 
  (iii) UMYUK requires five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes or its 
equivalent including English Language, Hausa and 
any other three (3) Arts/Social Science subjects 
with ‘O’ level credit pass in Mathematics.  
  
UTME SUBJECTS  
(i) BAYERO and UDU accept Hausa plus any other two (2) 
Arts subjects.  
(iv) KASU accepts English Language, Hausa and any other 
subjects from Arts or Social Sciences as UTME 
subjects.  
(ii) SLUK accepts Hausa plus any two (2) Arts and/or Social 
Science subjects.
